== Tango Desktop Project ==

Mobbler uses the following icons from version 0.8.1 of the [http://tango.freedesktop.org/ Tango Icon Library], which have been modified for use on S60. Tango generously released these under a Creative Commons [http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.5/ Attribution-Share Alike licence], and so these modified icons are also released under the same licence:

 * [http://code.google.com/p/mobbler/source/browse/gfx/ban.svg ban.svg]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/mobbler/source/browse/gfx/love.svg love.svg]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/mobbler/source/browse/gfx/more.svg more.svg]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/mobbler/source/browse/gfx/next.svg next.svg]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/mobbler/source/browse/gfx/play.svg play.svg]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/mobbler/source/browse/gfx/speaker_high.svg speaker_high.svg]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/mobbler/source/browse/gfx/speaker_low.svg speaker_low.svg]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/mobbler/source/browse/gfx/stop.svg stop.svg]

Mobbler also uses the following icons from version 0.8.90 of the [http://tango.freedesktop.org/ Tango Icon Library], which Tango has even more generously released to the public domain:

 * [http://code.google.com/p/mobbler/source/browse/gfx/audio-x-generic.png audio-x-generic.png]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/mobbler/source/browse/gfx/office-calendar.png office-calendar.png]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/mobbler/source/browse/gfx/preferences-desktop-multimedia.png preferences-desktop-multimedia.png]
